snippet: The Romney campaign released a new attack ad Tuesday alleging that the Obama administration is "gutting" the welfare-to-work program, though as governor Mr. Romney advocated a similar approach.
abstract: The Romney campaign released a new attack ad Tuesday alleging that the Obama administration is "gutting" the welfare-to-work program, though as governor Mr. Romney advocated a similar approach.

headline.main: New Romney Ad Attacks Obama on Welfare Waivers
